fn.p: Abbreviations: BAL, bronco-alveolar lavage; f.f.u., focus forming units; HA, haemagglutinin; H1N1; PR8, A/Puerto Rico/8/34; H3N2; HK, A/Hong Kong/01/68; HRP, horseradish peroxidase; H HEK, human embryonic kidney cells; IAV, influenza A virus; KO, knock-out; MDCK, Madin-Darby canine kidney II; MEM, minimal essential medium; NAT, N-acetylated trypsin; NGS, next generation sequencing; p.i., post infection; SLIC, sequence and ligation independent cloning; SPF, specific pathogen free; TPCK-trypsin, tosyl phenylalanyl chloromethyl ketone treated trypsin; Tmprss2-/-, Tmprss2 knock-out; Tmprss2 deficient; WT, wild type; WB, wash buffer.
Three supplementary figures and two supplementary tables are available with the online version of this article.
